attributes.action: remove the Human Rights of those who have removed the Rights of others
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In a recent case, beautiful Baby P had his rights taken off him from the people who were meant to enforce them. His right to life, his right to freedom from torture and degraded treatment and more. Why shouuld criminlas who have taken the rights of others be allowed to maintain theirs.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
